#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
   {long long int n,j,x;
   	  	cin>>n;
			 x=1;			
   	  if(n!=0)
		 while(n!=0){
		 
   	  	
		 long long	int a[n],sum=0,p,z=0;
   	  	for(j=0;j<n;j++)
   	  	{  
   	  	cin>>a[j];
   	  	sum+=a[j];
			 }
			 p=sum/n;
			 for(j=0;j<n;j++)
			  {
			  z+=abs(p-a[j]);
				 
			  }cout<<"Set #"<<x<<endl;
			  cout<<"The minimum number of moves is "<<z/2<<"."<<endl;
			 cin>>n;
			 x++;
		 
   }
   }
